name: Hsa-Uwc Holy Song - Blessing Of Glory

content.text:
[Verse 1]
        [ch]C[/ch]        [ch]Am[/ch]     [ch]C[/ch]                       [ch]F[/ch]         [ch]C[/ch]    [ch]G[/ch]
Now the light of Glory arises like the sun that shines on high;
[ch]Am[/ch]               [ch]Em[/ch]           [ch]C[/ch]        [ch]F[/ch]            [ch]C[/ch]  
Now a waken into freedom, O revive you spirits, O revive!
[ch]Am[/ch]                         [ch]Em[/ch]              [ch]F[/ch]        [ch]G[/ch]              [ch]C[/ch]  
Wake the mountains and the valleys; bring alive the springs of the earth.
          [ch]C[/ch]        [ch]Am[/ch]            [ch]Em[/ch]       [ch]Am[/ch]     [ch]Em[/ch]    [ch]G7[/ch]
Light the world forever with the light of your rebirth.
          [ch]F[/ch]          [ch]C[/ch] [ch]Am[/ch]        [ch]F[/ch]        [ch]G[/ch]       [ch]C[/ch]      [ch]G7[/ch]
Light the world forever with the Light of your re-birth.

[Verse 2]
        [ch]C[/ch]        [ch]Am[/ch]             [ch]C[/ch]                    [ch]F[/ch]      [ch]C[/ch]    [ch]G[/ch]    
We are called to bring back the glory to the life of God a above;
        [ch]Am[/ch]          [ch]Em[/ch]                  [ch]C[/ch]  [ch]F[/ch]                 [ch]C[/ch]  
Now the Lord in His greatness fills the universe with tender love,
     [ch]Am[/ch]             [ch]Em[/ch]            [ch]F[/ch]       [ch]G[/ch]          [ch]C[/ch]
Ever seeking souls awakened, ever calling them to be free.
    [ch]C[/ch]         [ch]Am[/ch]              [ch]Em[/ch] [ch]Am[/ch]      [ch]Em[/ch]  [ch]G7[/ch]
How shall I attend Him who is calling to me?
          [ch]F[/ch]        [ch]C[/ch]  [ch]Am[/ch]      [ch]F[/ch]  [ch]G[/ch]       [ch]C[/ch]   [ch]G7[/ch]
How shall I attend Him who is calling to me?

[Verse 3]
         [ch]C[/ch]       [ch]Am[/ch]       [ch]C[/ch]                    [ch]F[/ch]       [ch]C[/ch]     [ch]G[/ch]
From the dark of death I awaken and rejoice to live in grace;
         [ch]Am[/ch]              [ch]Em[/ch]               [ch]C[/ch]     [ch]F[/ch]           [ch]C[/ch]  
When the one who came to save me holds me tenderly in His embrace;
    [ch]Am[/ch]                [ch]Em[/ch]             [ch]F[/ch]       [ch]G[/ch]       [ch]C[/ch]
I rejoice to feel the comfort of the love He has for me.
       [ch]C[/ch]           [ch]Am[/ch]         [ch]Em[/ch]     [ch]Am[/ch]    [ch]Em[/ch]  [ch]G7[/ch]
What a blessing of Glory to rejoice eternally.
       [ch]F[/ch]           [ch]C[/ch]   [ch]Am[/ch]     [ch]F[/ch]      [ch]G[/ch]     [ch]C[/ch]   [ch]G7[/ch]
What a blessing of Glory to rejoice eternally.

[Verse 4]
       [ch]C[/ch]        [ch]Am[/ch]      [ch]C[/ch]                        [ch]F[/ch]       [ch]C[/ch]    [ch]G[/ch]
Now He lifts me up to embrace me in the Blessing that is mine;
       [ch]Am[/ch]            [ch]Em[/ch]             [ch]C[/ch]       [ch]F[/ch]            [ch]C[/ch]  
What a blessing to receive Him in a love so tender and divine;
        [ch]Am[/ch]           [ch]Em[/ch]                [ch]F[/ch]      [ch]G[/ch]           [ch]C[/ch]
How can I return the blessing? Tho' in all my life I will try.
      [ch]C[/ch]          [ch]Am[/ch]            [ch]Em[/ch] [ch]Am[/ch]     [ch]Em[/ch]  [ch]G7[/ch]
I can never stop feeling how unworthy am I.
      [ch]F[/ch]             [ch]C[/ch]  [ch]Am[/ch]      [ch]F[/ch]  [ch]G[/ch]      [ch]C[/ch] 
I can never stop feeling how unworthy am I.

[ch]Bb[/ch]               [ch]Cm[/ch]            [ch]Fm[/ch]               [ch]Eb[/ch]
Bore the deepest torture as He saw His children die.
[ch]Eb[/ch]        [ch]Ab[/ch] [ch]Cm[/ch]        [ch]Eb[/ch]     [ch]Bb[/ch]     [ch]Eb[/ch]       [ch]Ab[/ch]
Every day He seeks the beauty lost inside our hearts,
[ch]Ab[/ch]    [ch]Eb[/ch]      [ch]Fm[/ch]      [ch]Eb[/ch]       [ch]Fm[/ch]      [ch]Eb[/ch]        [ch]Bb[/ch]     [ch]Eb[/ch]
Tenderly with love He leads us back to life with Him on high.
[ch]Ab[/ch]  [ch]Eb[/ch]   [ch]Cm[/ch]      [ch]Gm[/ch]   [ch]Eb[/ch]     [ch]Bb[/ch]     [ch]Bbsus4[/ch]   [ch]Bb[/ch]
How many fathoms deep is His aching heart?
[ch]Eb[/ch]               [ch]Cm[/ch]       [ch]Ab[/ch]      [ch]Bb[/ch]              [ch]Eb[/ch]
All the tears He shed for earth became an endless sea.

[Verse 3]
[ch]Eb[/ch]            [ch]Cm[/ch]              [ch]Ab[/ch]  [ch]Eb[/ch] [ch]Ab[/ch]       [ch]Eb[/ch]
Deep from within the heart of heaven came the secret,
[ch]Bb[/ch]             [ch]Cm[/ch]                [ch]Fm[/ch]               [ch]Eb[/ch]
Now the mighty Word, the trumpet call will surely sound.
[ch]Eb[/ch]        [ch]Ab[/ch]  [ch]Cm[/ch]      [ch]Eb[/ch]   [ch]Bb[/ch]     [ch]Eb[/ch]        [ch]Ab[/ch]

[ch]Ab[/ch]   [ch]Eb[/ch]      [ch]Fm[/ch]     [ch]Eb[/ch]      [ch]Fm[/ch]     [ch]Eb[/ch]       [ch]Bb[/ch]   [ch]Eb[/ch]
Satisfied to wander aimless in the darkness underground.
[ch]Ab[/ch]      [ch]Eb[/ch]     [ch]Cm[/ch]      [ch]Gm[/ch]   [ch]Eb[/ch]       [ch]Bb[/ch]       [ch]Bbsus4[/ch]   [ch]Bb[/ch]
Fearful is the time to come when the price is paid!
[ch]Eb[/ch]               [ch]Cm[/ch]       [ch]Ab[/ch]       [ch]Bb[/ch]            [ch]Eb[/ch]
One and all will face the judgment from an angry God.

[Verse 4]
[ch]Eb[/ch]        [ch]Cm[/ch]               [ch]Ab[/ch]   [ch]Eb[/ch] [ch]Ab[/ch]       [ch]Eb[/ch]
Quickly believe, my people quickly turn and follow!
[ch]Bb[/ch]           [ch]Cm[/ch]            [ch]Fm[/ch]                 [ch]Eb[/ch]
You can be enfolded in the warmth of Father's heart.
[ch]Eb[/ch]          [ch]Ab[/ch]   [ch]Cm[/ch]       [ch]Eb[/ch]    [ch]Bb[/ch]       [ch]Eb[/ch]      [ch]Ab[/ch]
All the joy that life can offer calls us home to Him,
[ch]Ab[/ch]     [ch]Eb[/ch]        [ch]Fm[/ch]    [ch]Eb[/ch]       [ch]Fm[/ch]     [ch]Eb[/ch]      [ch]Bb[/ch]  [ch]Eb[/ch]
Now He calls you to be near Him never again to be apart.
[ch]Ab[/ch]      [ch]Eb[/ch]      [ch]Cm[/ch]     [ch]Gm[/ch]   [ch]Eb[/ch]        [ch]Bb[/ch]       [ch]Bbsus4[/ch]   [ch]Bb[/ch]
When at last we run to Him, how He'll cry with joy!
[ch]Eb[/ch]             [ch]Cm[/ch]    [ch]Ab[/ch]     [ch]Bb[/ch]          [ch]Eb[/ch]
All rejoicing, all together now and evermore.

name: Hsa-Uwc Holy Song - Light Of Grace

content.text:
[Verse 1]
[ch]Bb[/ch]                 [ch]Eb[/ch]

[ch]Bb[/ch]                       [ch]F[/ch]
Lighting my dim shadowed way.
[ch]Bb[/ch]          [ch]Bb7[/ch]    [ch]Eb[/ch]          
O, Light of Grace, easing my pain,
[ch]Bb[/ch]                  [ch]F[/ch]      [ch]Bb[/ch]

[Chorus]

[ch]Bb[/ch]                      [ch]Eb[/ch]
Though clouds may come, hiding His face,
[ch]Bb[/ch]                     [ch]F[/ch]
Hiding the smile of my God,
[ch]Bb[/ch]                [ch]Bb7[/ch]   [ch]Eb[/ch]  
Though clouds may come, still He is there,
[ch]Bb[/ch]                [ch]F[/ch]      [ch]Bb[/ch]

[Chorus]
[ch]Bb[/ch]                 [ch]Gm[/ch]     [ch]F[/ch]     [ch]Bb[/ch]       [ch]Eb[/ch]  [ch]F[/ch]      [ch]Bb[/ch]
I'll give my life, and my love, unto the one God of Love.

[ch]Bb[/ch]              [ch]Eb[/ch]
Amid the storm, tossed on the sea,
[ch]Bb[/ch]                      [ch]F[/ch]
Beacon of hope, guiding me,
[ch]Bb[/ch]       [ch]Bb7[/ch]    [ch]Eb[/ch]  
Amid the storm, shelter is near,
[ch]Bb[/ch]               [ch]F[/ch]      [ch]Bb[/ch]

[Chorus]
[ch]Bb[/ch]                 [ch]Gm[/ch]     [ch]F[/ch]     [ch]Bb[/ch]       [ch]Eb[/ch]  [ch]F[/ch]      [ch]Bb[/ch]

name: Hsa-Uwc Holy Song - March Of The New Age

content.text:
[Verse 1]
[ch]G[/ch]                    [ch]C[/ch]          [ch]D[/ch]      [ch]C[/ch]                        [ch]A[/ch]     [ch]D[/ch]
Win the whole world, heaven and earth, God's will for all shall be fulfilled;
[ch]G[/ch]                [ch]C[/ch]            [ch]G[/ch]     [ch]Em[/ch]            [ch]D[/ch] [ch]G[/ch]      [ch]C[/ch]       [ch]G[/ch]
Teach to all men God's divine word, source of the Father's highest Truth.
                     [ch]C[/ch]      [ch]G[/ch]              [ch]D[/ch]               [ch]G[/ch]                    [ch]D[/ch]
Wake the mighty land that remains a sleep; loudly ring the bell and proclaim to all;
[ch]G[/ch]                        [ch]C[/ch]                [ch]G[/ch]     [ch]C[/ch]             [ch]G[/ch]       [ch]D[/ch]    [ch]G[/ch]
Fighting on till the day Satan falls in defeat, I'll take the task on by myself.
[ch]G[/ch]                [ch]C[/ch]               [ch]B[/ch]     [ch]Am[/ch]         [ch]G[/ch]             [ch]D[/ch]       [ch]G[/ch]
Share the persecution that Jesus knew, suffering abuse from the mocking crowd.


[Verse 2]
[ch]G[/ch]                    [ch]C[/ch]          [ch]D[/ch]      [ch]C[/ch]                        [ch]A[/ch]     [ch]D[/ch]
Win the whole world, heaven and earth, God's will for all shall be fulfilled;
[ch]G[/ch]                [ch]C[/ch]            [ch]G[/ch]     [ch]Em[/ch]            [ch]D[/ch] [ch]G[/ch]      [ch]C[/ch]       [ch]G[/ch]
Teach to all men God's divine word, source of the Father's blessed Grace,
                [ch]C[/ch]      [ch]G[/ch]               [ch]D[/ch]                 [ch]G[/ch]                    [ch]D[/ch]
Two hundred million in darkness dwell, bring to them the fire giving light to all; 
[ch]G[/ch]                        [ch]C[/ch]                [ch]G[/ch]     [ch]C[/ch]             [ch]G[/ch]      [ch]D[/ch]    [ch]G[/ch]
Fighting on till the day Satan falls in defeat, I'll hold the burden by myself.
[ch]G[/ch]                     [ch]C[/ch]               [ch]B[/ch]     [ch]Am[/ch]             [ch]G[/ch]       [ch]D[/ch]         [ch]G[/ch]
Share the heart of sadness that Jesus felt, praying in the garden alone with God.


[Verse 3]
[ch]G[/ch]                    [ch]C[/ch]          [ch]D[/ch]      [ch]C[/ch]                        [ch]A[/ch]     [ch]D[/ch]
Win the whole world, heaven and earth, God's will for all shall be fulfilled;
[ch]G[/ch]                [ch]C[/ch]            [ch]G[/ch]     [ch]Em[/ch]            [ch]D[/ch] [ch]G[/ch]      [ch]C[/ch]       [ch]G[/ch]
Teach to all men God's divine word, source of the Father's deepest Life.
                  [ch]C[/ch]      [ch]G[/ch]               [ch]D[/ch]               [ch]G[/ch]                     [ch]D[/ch]
Tell the universe in the black of night. Shouting with a strong voice a waking all;
[ch]G[/ch]                        [ch]C[/ch]                [ch]G[/ch]     [ch]C[/ch]              [ch]G[/ch]      [ch]D[/ch]    [ch]G[/ch]
Fighting on till the day Satan falls in defeat, I'll fight the battle by myself.
[ch]G[/ch]                     [ch]C[/ch]            [ch]B[/ch]    [ch]Am[/ch]           [ch]G[/ch]           [ch]D[/ch]    [ch]G[/ch]
Take the cross and follow as Jesus did, dying on the mountain at Calvary.


[Verse 4]
[ch]G[/ch]                    [ch]C[/ch]          [ch]D[/ch]      [ch]C[/ch]                        [ch]A[/ch]     [ch]D[/ch]
Win the whole world, heaven and earth, God's will for all shall be fulfilled;
[ch]G[/ch]                [ch]C[/ch]            [ch]G[/ch]     [ch]Em[/ch]            [ch]D[/ch] [ch]G[/ch]      [ch]C[/ch]        [ch]G[/ch]
Teach to all men God's divine word, source of the Father's greatest Love.
                        [ch]C[/ch]    [ch]G[/ch]              [ch]D[/ch]              [ch]G[/ch]                       [ch]D[/ch]
Tell the people trapped in a world of fear. Raising up the flag, we will free them all;
[ch]G[/ch]                        [ch]C[/ch]                [ch]G[/ch]     [ch]C[/ch]         [ch]G[/ch]        [ch]D[/ch]    [ch]G[/ch]
Fighting on till the day Satan falls in defeat, I'll persevere now by myself.
[ch]G[/ch]                   [ch]C[/ch]               [ch]B[/ch]     [ch]Am[/ch]       [ch]G[/ch]           [ch]D[/ch]      [ch]G[/ch]
Let our Father rest from His lonely toil, history awaits us to do His will.

content.text:

[ch]D[/ch]   [ch]G[/ch]     [ch]C[/ch]            [ch]G[/ch]       [ch]Em[/ch]      [ch]C[/ch]     [ch]D[/ch]

Because I had no strength to bear the load He gave to me,

content.text:
[Verse 1]
[ch]Eb[/ch]        [ch]Cm[/ch]     [ch]Eb[/ch]

           [ch]Cm[/ch]        [ch]Fm[/ch]   [ch]Bb7[/ch] [ch]Eb[/ch]

         [ch]Ab[/ch]     [ch]Gm[/ch]          [ch]Cm[/ch]

[ch]Fm[/ch]        [ch]Cm[/ch]       [ch]Fm7[/ch]      [ch]Bb[/ch] [ch]Eb[/ch]

[ch]Cm[/ch]    [ch]Ab[/ch]     [ch]Gm[/ch]

[ch]Cm[/ch]          [ch]Ab[/ch]       [ch]Bb[/ch]   [ch]Eb[/ch]  [ch]Bb[/ch]

[ch]Cm[/ch]   [ch]Ab[/ch]           [ch]Cm[/ch]     [ch]Gm[/ch]

[ch]Eb[/ch]           [ch]Fm[/ch]           [ch]Bb[/ch] [ch]Gm7[/ch] [ch]Bb7[/ch] [ch]Eb[/ch]

[ch]Cm[/ch]    [ch]Ab[/ch]             [ch]Bb[/ch]    [ch]Eb[/ch] [ch]Bb[/ch]

[ch]Cm[/ch]      [ch]Ab[/ch]            [ch]Cm[/ch] [ch]Gm[/ch]

[ch]Eb[/ch]        [ch]Fm[/ch]        [ch]Bb[/ch] [ch]Gm7[/ch] [ch]Bb7[/ch]  [ch]Eb[/ch]

[ch]Cm[/ch]       [ch]Ab[/ch]          [ch]Bb[/ch]      [ch]Eb[/ch] [ch]Bb[/ch]

[ch]Cm[/ch]     [ch]Ab[/ch]               [ch]Cm[/ch]   [ch]Gm[/ch]

[ch]Eb[/ch]          [ch]Fm[/ch]           [ch]Bb[/ch] [ch]Gm7[/ch] [ch]Bb7[/ch] [ch]Eb[/ch]

name: Hsa-Uwc Holy Song - Song Of The Spring Breeze

content.text:
"You cannot know how much inspiration and comfort I received from this song," Reverend Moon said of this
melody which he sang daily during his time in prison camp in North Korea. In Korea the winter often reaches
sub-zero temperatures making the coming spring a dramatic, long awaited change. This song reflects that
longing.


[Verse 1]
[ch]Eb[/ch]                        [ch]Bb[/ch]          [ch]Eb[/ch]
Snow and cold wind of the bitter dark night,
[ch]Ab[/ch]                                       [ch]Eb[/ch]
Lift off the wight of your cold ruthless hand;
[ch]Eb[/ch]                               [ch]Bb[/ch]            [ch]Cm[/ch]
Spring breeze will chase you and bring flowery fragrances,
[ch]Ab[/ch]            [ch]Eb[/ch]          [ch]Bb[/ch]         [ch]Eb[/ch]
Breathing new life to the suffocated hills.


[Verse 2]
[ch]Eb[/ch]                          [ch]Bb[/ch]           [ch]Eb[/ch]
Though you most ruthless of winter winds blow,
[ch]Ab[/ch]                                  [ch]Eb[/ch]
Doomed in a moment you too shall be calmed;
[ch]Eb[/ch]                               [ch]Bb[/ch]            [ch]Cm[/ch]
Spring breeze will chase you and bring flowery fragrances,
[ch]Ab[/ch]            [ch]Eb[/ch]          [ch]Bb[/ch]         [ch]Eb[/ch]
Breathing new life to the suffocated hills.


[Verse 3]
[ch]Eb[/ch]                      [ch]Bb[/ch]            [ch]Eb[/ch]
Butterfly awake and you meadowlark of spring,
[ch]Ab[/ch]                                       [ch]Eb[/ch]
Our land has suffered this nightmare too long;
[ch]Eb[/ch]                               [ch]Bb[/ch]            [ch]Cm[/ch]
Spring breeze will chase you and bring flowery fragrances,
[ch]Ab[/ch]            [ch]Eb[/ch]          [ch]Bb[/ch]         [ch]Eb[/ch]
Breathing new life to the suffocated hills.
